document_data.name: Zarjhan
document_data.mainbody: '''Clethtinthtiallor Zarjhan''' was a [[dragonborn]] of [[Tymanther]] and the patriarch of [[Clan Clethtinthtiallor]] in [[1487 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1487 DR, Zarjhan was one of the clan elders who supported the decision to allow [[Namshita]]'s refugees to live in Tymanther, in gratitude for Namshita's role in the liberation of members of Clan Clethtinthtiallor that had being enslaved by [[Gilgeam]] after the return of Unther to Toril.
